Title: Works-in-Progress

Title: The Dance Exchange Spring Concert Series
Description: Performed at Epiphany Church in Washington, D.C. Dances performed were "Ms. Galaxy and Her Three Raps with God"; "Woman of the Clear Vision"; "Difficulty in the Beginning"; and "First Solos: an Anthology."
